Articles.Content:
So...since we're geeks here, right....right?

I was thinking a forum game of D&D might be in order, 4th edition, no super-obscure books. (Preferably just PH 1 & 2 & 3)

If this gets off the ground, maybe I'll take a 4-5 party, play around on some old storylines I have kicking around.

Thoughts?
